name: Aztec
description: multi bot with rich features made by Vorterx team

PREFIX.description: Prefix of your bot Ex: . , / , # , & etc. Put anythong except @ (Default is .)

BOTNAME.description: Put your bot name here as its required.

SESSION_ID.description: A sessionld that you scanned paste it here.

LEVEL_UP.description: To enable auto level up set true or false or enable or disable

MENU.description: Choose number between 0 and 2 were 2 is aztec menu 0 suhail menu or if you want it to change randomly leave it blank

MODS.description: Put any phone number without + , () and spaces "," Ex: 27686881509 )
